channel.title: Help?

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

If(playerIsNotOnAcients and playersWeaponIs11358 or playersWeaponIs4675) {
c.sM(“You cannot auto cast normal magics with an ancient staff”);
break;
}

That’s what that first if statement is saying. That should be a hint on how to add on.

P.S. Check the Item Ids in your source for more information!

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @tribalx tribalx
item.description:
@tribalx wrote:

if(c.playerAncientMagics == 0 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 11358 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4675) { c.sM("You cannot auto cast normal magics with an ancient staff!"); break; } if(c.playerAncientMagics == 1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 11358 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4675) { c.sM("You cannot auto cast ancient magics with a regular staff!"); break; } if(c.playerAncientMagics == 2) { c.sM("You cannot auto cast lunar magics");

I want to add more staffs to use ancient magics but I do not know how, your help is appreciated

Read full topic
